attributes.action: repudiate the petition asking for the U.K. to be allowed to join the Human Space programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How much would this cost?  Probably millions, if not BILLIONS, of pounds.  I can think of ANY NUMBER of other things that sort of money could be spent on to benefit people in THIS world; why spend such incredible sums on space exploration?  Let's get this world in order first! - it's hardly perfect- before exploring other worlds.
